paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant p.Val142Ile, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Mean age 73 ± 7 years, all patients declared African ancestries.
patients.phenotype: Transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis with confirmed cardiac phenotype.

functional_data.summary: The p.Val142Ile variant is associated with transthyretin amyloidosis, leading to cardiac involvement.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on clinical presentation and familial segregation.
variants.additional_notes: All patients included in the study were carriers of the p.Val142Ile mutation.
key_quotes: All patients declared African ancestries and gene sequencing displayed the transthyretin p.Val142Ile mutation.
Systemic transthyretin amyloidosis was confirmed in all patients by histological demonstration of amyloid fibrils.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on a specific variant in the TTR gene.
